ml.alternet.parser.util

Interface ComposedRule<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the composition : Rule or List<Rule>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TraversableRule.CombinedRule, TraversableRule.SimpleRule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Grammar.Choice, Grammar.Combine, Grammar.Except, Grammar.OneOrMore, Grammar.Optional, Grammar.Proxy, Grammar.Proxy.Deferred, Grammar.Proxy.Named, Grammar.Sequence, Grammar.Skip, Grammar.TypedToken, Grammar.Wrapper, Grammar.ZeroOrMore

    public interface ComposedRule<T>
    Used for a rule that wraps another rule or that is a combination of several rules.
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T getComponent()
      The rule(s).
      void setComponent(T component)
      Set the combined rules within.

        The rule(s).

        Set the combined rules within.
        Parameters:
        component - The actual rule(s).
